name: Chambers of Anubis
description:
This is our entry for the HallowIIn Jam.

Move: W A S D
Transform: F
Attack: Left M

Its an action dungeon crawler in which you have transform into an where wolf to kill your enemy's, but the longer your in this mode the harder it gets. The drink is the only way to undo the effects.

We tell the story of a boy who got kidnapped into anubis´s chamber. As a werewolf he has to fight his way out while slowly losing control over himself and his power. Will he face the ancient god and defeat him?

Have fun and give feedback :3
